TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceBase extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 为将作为服务应用程序的一部分而存在的服务提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for a service that will exist as part of a service application.

summary.span: 在创建新的服务类时，必须从 派生。

span.span: must be derived from when creating a new service class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自服务应用程序中定义您的服务类时。Derive from when defining your service class in a service application. 任何有用的服务重写和方法。Any useful service overrides the and methods. 对于其他功能，可以重写和与在响应中的服务状态的更改的特定行为。For additional functionality, you can override and with specific behavior in response to changes in the service state. 服务是不支持用户界面的长时间运行可执行文件不可能登录的用户帐户下运行。A service is a long-running executable that does not support a user interface, and which might not run under the logged-on user account. 该服务可以没有任何用户在登录到计算机的情况下运行。The service can run without any user being logged on to the computer. 默认情况下，服务不是管理员帐户相同的系统帐户下运行。By default, services run under the System account, which is not the same as the Administrator account. 不能更改系统帐户的权限。You cannot change the rights of the System account. 或者，可以使用以指定将在其下运行服务的用户帐户。Alternatively, you can use a to specify a user account under which the service will run. 可执行文件可以包含多个服务，但必须包含一个单独为每个服务。An executable can contain more than one service but must contain a separate for each service. 实例向系统注册该服务。The instance registers the service with the system. 安装程序还将每个服务的事件日志可用于记录服务命令相关联。The installer also associates each service with an event log that you can use to record service commands. `main()`可执行文件中的函数定义应运行哪些服务。The `main()` function in the executable defines which services should run. 该服务的当前工作目录是系统目录中，不是可执行文件所在的目录。The current working directory of the service is the system directory, not the directory in which the executable is located. 启动服务时，系统查找可执行文件并运行可执行文件中包含该服务的方法。When you start a service, the system locates the executable and runs the method for that service, contained within the executable. 但是，运行该服务不是与运行可执行文件相同。However, running the service is not the same as running the executable. 可执行文件仅加载服务。The executable only loads the service. 通过服务控制管理器中，在服务受访问 （例如，启动和停止）。The service is accessed (for example, started and stopped) through the Service Control Manager. 可执行文件调用派生类的构造函数第一次调用服务上的开始。The executable calls the derived class's constructor the first time you call Start on the service. 构造函数执行后立即调用命令处理方法。The command-handling method is called immediately after the constructor executes. 构造函数不会执行后首次加载该服务，因此需要单独的执行从执行的构造函数的处理。The constructor is not executed again after the first time the service has been loaded, so it is necessary to separate the processing performed by the constructor from that performed by . 可以通过释放任何资源应在创建。Any resources that can be released by should be created in . 在构造函数中创建资源阻止它们被正确创建，如果服务启动后再次具有已释放的资源。Creating resources in the constructor prevents them from being created properly if the service is started again after has released the resources. 服务控制管理器 (SCM) 提供了一种方法与服务进行交互。The Service Control Manager (SCM) provides a way to interact with the service. 可以使用 SCM 将传递到该服务的启动、 停止、 暂停、 继续或自定义命令。You can use the SCM to pass Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, or custom commands into the service. SCM 将使用的值和来确定服务是否接受停止、 暂停或继续命令。The SCM uses the values of and to determine whether the service accepts Stop, Pause, or Continue commands. 停止、 暂停和继续启用 SCM 的上下文菜单仅当在相应的属性或是`true`服务类中。Stop, Pause, and Continue are enabled in the SCM's context menus only if the corresponding property or is `true` in the service class. 如果启用，则将命令传递到服务，并， ，或调用。If enabled, the command is passed to the service, and , , or is called. 如果， ，或是`false`，相应的命令处理方法 (如) 将不会处理，即使已实现该方法。If , , or is `false`, the corresponding command-handling method (such as ) will not be processed, even if you have implemented the method. 可以使用类以编程方式执行 SCM 执行使用用户界面。You can use the class to do programmatically what the SCM does using a user interface. 可以自动执行可在控制台中的任务。You can automate the tasks available in the console. 如果， ，或是`true`但尚未实现相应的命令处理方法 (如) 系统引发异常，并将忽略该命令。If , , or is `true` but you have not implemented a corresponding command-handling method (such as ) the system throws an exception and ignores the command. 不需要实现， ，或在任何其他方法。You do not have to implement , , or any other method in . 但是中, 介绍了服务的行为，因此最小值，应重写此成员。However, the service's behavior is described in , so at minimum, this member should be overridden. `main()`函数的可执行文件中注册服务可执行文件与服务控制管理器中，通过调用方法。The `main()` function of the executable registers the service in the executable with the Service Control Manager by calling the method. 的属性对象传递给方法必须与匹配该服务的服务安装程序的属性。The property of the object passed to the method must match the property of the service installer for that service. 可以使用`InstallUtil.exe`若要在系统上安装服务。You can use `InstallUtil.exe` to install services on your system. > [!NOTE] > 可以指定应用程序事件日志，以接收通知的服务调用，但未一个日志也不属性可以写入自定义日志。You can specify a log other than the Application event log to receive notification of service calls, but neither the nor the property can write to a custom log. 设置到`false`如果您不想要使用自动日志记录。Set to `false` if you do not want to use automatic logging.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不创建的实例类。Do not create an instance of the class. 相反，派生和实例化派生的类。Instead, derive from and instantiate your derived class. 您需要从继承的类的构造函数中实现所需的最低是设置上你的组件。The minimum you need to implement in the constructor for a class inherited from is to set the on your component. 没有任何其他处理专门所需的构造函数中。No other processing is specifically required in the constructor. 应处理中的大多数初始化而不是在构造函数中。You should handle most initialization in rather than in the constructor. 否则，则对象将被重新初始化后，重新启动服务已停止时无法保证。Otherwise, there is no guarantee the objects will be reinitialized when you restart a service after it has been stopped. 如果您在派生类中重写构造函数，在代码中调用基类构造函数。If you override the constructor in your derived class, call the base class constructor in your code. 构造函数设置到`true`。The constructor sets to `true`. 如果不希望自动登录到服务调用从服务控制管理器 (SCM)，设置到`false`。If you do not want to automatically log calls to the service from the Service Control Manager (SCM), set to `false`. 如果可执行文件包含单个服务，系统将开始从 SCM，选择和运行析构函数，如果调用停止时调用服务的构造函数。If the executable contains a single service, the system calls the service's constructor when Start is selected from the SCM, and runs the destructor if Stop is called. 如果可执行文件包含多个服务，调用一个服务上的启动会导致构造函数调用的所有服务在可执行文件，但仅在指定的服务已启动。If the executable contains multiple services, calling Start on one service causes the constructors to be called for all services in the executable, but only the specified service is started. 当所有服务都停止后，不单独每个服务都停止时，将一起运行的服务的析构函数。Destructors for the services are run together when all services have been stopped, not individually when each service is stopped. > [!NOTE] > 如果重写基类构造函数，则应在派生类的构造函数中显式调用它。If you override the base class constructor, you should explicitly call it in the constructor of your derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoLog { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoLog : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示是否在事件日志中报告“开始”、“停止”、“暂停”以及“继续”命令。

span.span: Indicates whether to report Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue commands in the event log.

value.span: 为 时在事件日志中报告信息；否则为 。

span.span: to report information in the event log; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`指示服务启动、 停止、 暂停、 用于报告命令失败，以及状态更改信息在应用程序事件日志并继续在服务上的事件。Setting to `true` instructs the service to use the Application event log to report command failures, as well as state change information for Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue events on the service. 服务的名称用作日志的。The name of the service is used as the log's . 要向自定义事件日志而不是应用程序日志中报告的信息，请将到`false`和写入命令处理方法中的说明， ，或要发布到相应的日志。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log. > [!NOTE] > ，提供为事件日志中，源字符串必须之前服务将尝试写入事件日志设置。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service attempts to write to the event log. 尝试访问事件日志设置的源名称之前引发异常。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandlePowerEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandlePowerEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是否可以处理计算机电源状态更改通知。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can handle notifications of computer power status changes.

value.span: 如果服务处理 类中指示的计算机电源状态更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service handles the computer power status changes indicated in the class, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当计算机电源状态更改时，服务控制管理器 (SCM) 验证该服务是否接受使用的值的电源事件命令。When the computer power status changes, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts power event commands using the value of . 如果是`true`，则将命令传递到服务和如果定义调用方法。If is `true`, the command is passed to the service and the method is called if defined. 如果未实现在派生类中，则 SCM 处理通过空基类电源事件方法。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the power event through the empty base class method.

exception.span: 此属性将在服务启动后被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandleSessionChangeEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是否可以处理从终端服务器会话接收到的会话更改事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service can handle session change events received from a Terminal Server session.

value.span: 如果服务可以处理终端服务器会话更改事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can handle Terminal Server session change events; otherwise, .

exception.span: 此属性将在服务启动后被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanPauseAndContinue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanPauseAndContinue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务是否可以暂停并再继续的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be paused and resumed.

value.span: 如果服务可以暂停，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can be paused; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值设置服务的构造函数中的属性。Set the value of the property in the constructor for the service. 暂停服务后，它会停止正在进行的工作。When a service is paused, it halts what it is doing. 如果继续操作 （无论是通过服务控制管理器或以编程方式），该服务运行。When you continue the service (either through the Service Control Manager or programmatically), runs. 暂停请求发送到服务可以节省系统资源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources. 暂停可能不会释放所有系统资源，但停止。Pause may not release all system resources, but Stop does. 并通常实现来执行较少的处理比和。 and are often implemented to perform less processing than and . 当是`true`，重写和以指定服务控制管理器 (SCM) 将暂停或继续请求传递给你的服务时应发生的处理。When is `true`, override and to specify the processing that should occur when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 应实现撤消中的处理。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果是`false`、 SCM 不会传递暂停或继续向该服务，因此请求和即使它们实现不会调用方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. 在 SCM 中`Pause`并`Continue`控件被禁用时是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanShutdown : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示系统关闭时是否应通知服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service should be notified when the system is shutting down.

value.span: 如果系统关闭时应通知服务，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service should be notified when the system is shutting down; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，当系统关闭时通知该服务。If is `true`, the service is notified when the system is shutting down. 在关机，如果已实现派生类中调用方法。At shutdown, the method is called if it has been implemented in your derived class. > [!NOTE] > 仅系统应该会导致方法来执行; 该服务可以调用它，但建议不这样做。Only the system should cause the method to execute; the service can call it, but this is not recommended.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanStop : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务启动后是否可以停止。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be stopped once it has started.

value.span: 如果服务可以停止并调用了 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can be stopped and the method called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务控制管理器 (SCM) 服务上调用停止时，验证该服务是否接受停止命令使用的值。When Stop is called on a service, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts Stop commands using the value of . 对于大多数服务的值是`true`，但某些操作系统服务，例如，不允许用户将其停止。For most services, the value of is `true`, but some operating system services, for example, do not allow the user to stop them. 如果是`true`，停止命令传递给服务和如果它定义调用方法。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service and the method is called if it is defined. 如果未在派生类中，停止命令通过空基类的 SCM 句柄实现方法。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the Stop command through the empty base class method.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用派生类中 (也通过它在类) 完成后使用派生的类。Call in your derived class (and through it, in the class) when you are finished using the derived class. 方法将使派生的类中不可用状态。The method leaves the derived class in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对派生类的所有引用和以便可以通过垃圾回收收回它们占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the derived class and so the memory they were occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 始终调用发布到类派生自最后一个引用之前。Always call before you release your last reference to the class derived from . 否则为资源并且派生的类使用的将垃圾回收调用对象的析构函数之前不会释放。Otherwise, the resources and the derived class are using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the objects' destructors. 通常实现来处理中的代码组合使用调用。 is often implemented to process the code in , combined with a call to . 如果您选择执行此操作在派生类中，惯例做法是实现以分配任何发布。If you choose to do this in your derived class, it is customary to implement to allocate whatever released.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property EventLog As EventLog
public: virtual property System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ EventLog { System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个事件日志，它可用于将服务命令调用的通知（如“开始”和“停止”）写入“应用程序”事件日志。

span.span: Gets an event log you can use to write notification of service command calls, such as Start and Stop, to the Application event log.

value.span: 实例，它的源注册到 Application 日志中。

span.span: An instance whose source is registered to the Application log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化属性设置为与实例和属性集。The constructor initializes the property to an instance with the and properties set. 源是的服务和日志是计算机的应用程序日志。The source is the of the service, and the log is the computer's Application log. 这些值自动设置，不能更改的服务命令自动日志记录功能。These values are set automatically and cannot be changed for automatic logging of service commands. 当是`true`，启动、 停止、 暂停、 继续、 和自定义命令在应用程序事件日志中自动记录。When is `true`, Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, and custom commands are recorded automatically in the Application event log. 可以使用属性将其他消息写入该日志。You can use the property to write additional messages to that log as well. 组件调用使用此成员。The component calls using this member. 要向自定义事件日志而不是应用程序日志中报告的信息，请将到`false`和写入命令处理方法中的说明， ，或要发布到相应的日志。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExitCode { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExitCode : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务的退出代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code for the service.
The exit code for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性在停止服务，以指示错误到服务控制管理器之前的非零值。Set the property to a non-zero value before stopping the service to indicate an error to the Service Control Manager.

summary.span: 指示服务名称的最大大小。

span.span: Indicates the maximum size for a service name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ServiceName 和 DisplayName 都具有在服务类上设置属性时，必须遵守的大小限制。ServiceName and DisplayName both have size restrictions that must be observed when setting the properties on your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnContinue() cil managed
abstract member OnContinue : unit -> unit override this.OnContinue : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时， 于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“继续”命令发送到服务时运行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, runs when a Continue command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定要在服务暂停后恢复正常功能时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service resumes normal functioning after being paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现镜像应用程序的响应。Implement to mirror your application's response to . 如果继续操作 （无论是通过服务控制台或以编程方式），该服务处理运行，并在服务再次变为活动状态。When you continue the service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing runs, and the service becomes active again. 需要时重写属性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 如果是`false`、 SCM 不会传递暂停或继续向该服务，因此请求和即使它们实现不会调用方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. 在 SCM 中`Pause`并`Continue`控件被禁用时是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCustomCommand(int32 command) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCustomCommand (command As Integer)
abstract member OnCustomCommand : int -> unit override this.OnCustomCommand : int -> unit

param.name: command
param.span: 发送给服务的命令消息。

span.span: The command message sent to the service.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时， 于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 向服务传递自定义命令时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a custom command to the service.

summary.span: 指定要在具有指定参数值的命令出现时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a command with the specified parameter value occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定启动、 停止、 暂停和继续服务以外的其他功能。 lets you specify additional functionality beyond starting, stopping, pausing and continuing services. SCM 不检查自定义的命令来验证服务是否支持`command`传入参数。The SCM does not examine the custom command to verify whether the service supports the `command` parameter passed in. 它自定义命令将直接传递到该服务。It passes the custom command directly to the service. 如果该服务无法识别`command`参数，它不执行任何操作。If the service does not recognize the `command` parameter, it does nothing. 引发自定义命令中的语句组件。Custom commands are raised by an statement in a component. 使用 switch 语句或 if...然后使用条件来处理在服务定义的自定义命令。Use a switch statement or if..then condition to handle the custom commands you define on your service. 可以在你的应用程序中定义，也可以在中使用的自定义命令的唯一值是指介于 128 到 255 之间。The only values for a custom command that you can define in your application or use in are those between 128 and 255. 低于 128 的整数对应于系统保留值。Integers below 128 correspond to system-reserved values. 如果属性是`true`，自定义命令，与所有其他命令一样将条目写入到事件日志来报告该方法的执行是成功还是失败。If the property is `true`, custom commands, like all other commands, write entries to the event log to report whether the method execution succeeded or failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPause() cil managed
abstract member OnPause : unit -> unit override this.OnPause : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“暂停”命令发送到服务时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Pause command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定要在服务暂停时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service pauses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以指定在服务收到暂停命令时，会发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Pause command. 需要时重写属性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 如果继续操作已暂停的服务 （不管是通过服务控制台或以编程方式），运行时处理，并在服务再次变为活动状态。When you continue a paused service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing is run, and the service becomes active again. 暂停命令仅允许应用程序以对特定事件做出反应。The Pause command only allows your application to react to a specific event. 没有任何影响到的服务，您不定义要执行的操作。 does nothing to the service that you do not define it to do. 暂停请求发送到服务可以节省系统资源，因为暂停需要释放的所有系统资源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources because Pause need not release all system resources. 例如，如果线程已开启，过程暂停服务，而不是停止它可以使线程能够保持打开状态，因此不需要时，服务仍然重新分配。For example, if threads have been opened by the process, pausing a service rather than stopping it can allow the threads to remain open, obviating the need to reallocate them when the service continues. 如果定义暂停释放所有系统资源，它类似于停止命令。If you define Pause to release all system resources, it behaves like a Stop command. 设置到`true`，并重写和指定 SCM 将暂停或继续请求传递给你的服务时应发生的处理。Set to `true`, and override and to specify the processing that should occur when the SCM passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 应实现撤消中的处理。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果是`false`、 SCM 不会传递暂停或继续向该服务，因此请求和即使实现不会调用方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if implemented. 在 SCM 中`Pause`并`Continue`控件被禁用时是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnPowerEvent(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus powerStatus) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnPowerEvent (powerStatus As PowerBroadcastStatus) As Boolean
abstract member OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool override this.OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool

param.name: powerStatus
param.span: ，指示来自系统的有关电源状态的通知。

span.span: A that indicates a notification from the system about its power status.

summary.span: 当在派生类中实现时，该方法于计算机电源状态更改时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the computer's power status has changed.

summary.span: 这适用于膝上型计算机进入挂起模式时的情况，该模式不同于系统关闭。

span.span: This applies to laptop computers when they go into suspended mode, which is not the same as a system shutdown.

returns.span: 当在派生类中实现时，应用程序的需要将确定要返回的值。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, the needs of your application determine what value to return.

returns.span: 例如，如果传递了 广播状态，则可以通过返回 来使应用程序拒绝查询。

span.span: For example, if a broadcast status is passed, you could cause your application to reject the query by returning .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定发生时的系统事件中指示的处理发生枚举-例如，当计算机处于挂起模式，或者指示电池电量不足。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system event indicated in the enumeration occurs--for example, when the computer is placed in suspended mode or indicates low battery power. 需要时重写属性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSessionChange(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription changeDescription) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSessionChange (changeDescription As SessionChangeDescription)
abstract member OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit override this.OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit

span.span: A structure that identifies the change type.

summary.span: 从终端服务器会话接收到更改事件时执行。

span.span: Executes when a change event is received from a Terminal Server session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置属性设置为`true`若要启用此方法的执行。You must set the property to `true` to enable the execution of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnShutdown() cil managed
abstract member OnShutdown : unit -> unit override this.OnShutdown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于系统即将关闭时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the system is shutting down.

summary.span: 该方法指定应在系统即将关闭前执行的处理。

span.span: Specifies what should occur immediately prior to the system shutting down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以指定在系统关闭时，会发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system shuts down. 仅当操作系统时已关闭，未在计算机处于关闭状态时，将发生此事件。This event occurs only when the operating system is shut down, not when the computer is turned off. 需要时重写属性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStart(string[] args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnStart (args As String())
abstract member OnStart : string[] -> unit override this.OnStart : string[] -> unit

span.span: Data passed by the start command.

summary.span: 当在派生类中实现时，在下列情况下执行：在“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 向服务发送“开始”命令时，或者在操作系统启动时（对于自动启动的服务）。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Start command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM) or when the operating system starts (for a service that starts automatically).

summary.span: 指定服务启动时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when the service starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以指定当服务接收 Start 命令时发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Start command. 是在其中指定服务的行为的方法。 is the method in which you specify the behavior of the service. 可以采用自变量作为一种方式传递数据，但此使用情况很少见。 can take arguments as a way to pass data, but this usage is rare. > [!CAUTION] > 不要使用构造函数来执行处理，应为。Do not use the constructor to perform processing that should be in . 使用来处理你的服务的所有初始化。Use to handle all initialization of your service. 当应用程序的可执行文件时调用的构造函数运行时，不是在该服务运行时。The constructor is called when the application's executable runs, not when the service runs. 可执行文件运行之前。The executable runs before . 如果您继续，例如，构造函数不会再调用因为 SCM 已保留在内存中的对象。When you continue, for example, the constructor is not called again because the SCM already holds the object in memory. 如果释放分配的构造函数中而不是在资源，所需的资源不会创建第二个调用该服务时，将再次。If releases resources allocated in the constructor rather than in , the needed resources would not be created again the second time the service is called. 可以将服务设置为自动启动时重启计算机通过设置上服务的安装程序分发给。Services can be set to start automatically when the computer reboots by setting the on the service's installer to . 在这种情况下，则在系统启动时调用。In such a situation, would be called at system startup. 应在派生类中重写。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 服务很有用，和应同时实现服务类中。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class. 处理中的服务的初始化参数方法，不在 Main 方法中。Process initialization arguments for the service in the method, not in the Main method. 中的自变量`args`可以在服务控制台中服务的属性窗口中手动设置参数数组。The arguments in the `args` parameter array can be set manually in the properties window for the service in the Services console. 不保存在控制台中输入的参数;从控制面板启动该服务时，它们是一次性传递服务。The arguments entered in the console are not saved; they are passed to the service on a one-time basis when the service is started from the control panel. 必须为自动启动该服务时存在的参数可以放入服务的注册表项的 ImagePath 字符串值 (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\ *\<服务名称 >*)。Arguments that must be present when the service is automatically started can be placed in the ImagePath string value for the service's registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\*). 您可以从注册表使用获取自变量方法，例如： `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`。You can obtain the arguments from the registry using the method, for example: `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStop() cil managed
abstract member OnStop : unit -> unit override this.OnStop : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“停止”命令发送到服务时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Stop command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定服务停止运行时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service stops running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以指定当服务收到停止命令时发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Stop command. 在 SCM 接收停止命令，它使用的值以验证该服务是否接受停止命令。When the SCM receives a Stop command, it uses the value of to verify whether the service accepts Stop commands. 如果是`true`，停止命令传递给服务，和如果它定义调用方法。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service, and the method is called if it is defined. 如果未实现在服务中，则 SCM 处理停止命令。If is not implemented in the service, the SCM handles the Stop command. 如果是`false`，SCM 会忽略停止命令。If is `false`, the SCM ignores the Stop command. 它不被传递给该服务。It is not passed to the service. 停止命令返回，会引发异常。The Stop command returns and throws an exception. 应在派生类中重写。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 服务很有用，和应同时实现服务类中。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestAdditionalTime(int32 milliseconds) cil managed

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: 请求的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The requested time in milliseconds.

summary.span: 为挂起操作请求额外的时间。

span.span: Requests additional time for a pending operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法应调用的重写， ， ，或方法来请求更多时间为挂起的操作，以防止服务控制管理器 (SCM) 标记为未响应的服务。The method is intended to be called by the overridden , , , or methods to request additional time for a pending operation, to prevent the Service Control Manager (SCM) from marking the service as not responding. 如果不继续、 暂停、 启动和停止、 挂起操作引发。If the pending operation is not a continue, pause, start, or stop, an is thrown.

span.span: The service is not in a pending state.

summary.span: 为服务可执行文件提供主入口点。

span.span: Provides the main entry point for a service executable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase service) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (service As ServiceBase)

span.span: A which indicates a service to start.

summary.span: 在服务控制管理器 (SCM) 中注册服务的可执行文件。

span.span: Registers the executable for a service with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此重载`main()`可执行文件来注册该服务与服务控制管理器服务的功能。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the service with the Service Control Manager. 调用后，服务控制管理器发出一个 Start 命令，这会导致调用服务中的方法。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues a Start command, which results in a call to the method in the service. 直到执行启动命令，该服务才会开始。The service is not started until the Start command is executed. 方法调用方法与大致相同Windows 窗体应用程序。The method is called in much the same way as for Windows Forms applications. 如果是`true`，向事件日志写入一个条目，如果指定的服务`service`参数无法启动。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if the service specified by the `service` parameter fails to start.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase[] services) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (services As ServiceBase())

param.name: services
param.span: 一组 ServiceBase 实例，指示要启动的服务。

span.span: An array of ServiceBase instances, which indicate services to start.

summary.span: 在服务控制管理器 (SCM) 中注册多项服务的可执行文件。

span.span: Registers the executable for multiple services with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此重载`main()`可执行文件中注册这些服务与服务控制管理器服务的功能。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the services with the Service Control Manager. 调用后，服务控制管理器发出启动命令，这会导致调用中服务的方法。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues Start commands, which result in calls to the methods in the services. 直到执行 Start 命令后不会启动服务。The services are not started until the Start commands are executed. 方法调用方法与大致相同Windows 窗体应用程序的方法。The method is called in much the same way as the method for Windows Forms applications. 如果是`true`，向事件日志写入一个条目，如果数组中的任何服务无法启动。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if any service in the array fails to start.

span.span: You did not supply a service to start.

exception.span: 该数组可能为 或空。

span.span: The array might be or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceHandle As IntPtr
protected: property IntPtr ServiceHandle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取服务的服务控制句柄。

span.span: Gets the service control handle for the service.

value.span: 一个 结构，包含服务的服务控制句柄。

span.span: An structure that contains the service control handle for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务控制句柄用于通信的服务控制管理器 (SCM)。The service control handle is used to communicate with the Service Control Manager (SCM). 句柄可用于更新为使用非托管调用服务的服务控制管理器的状态信息`SetServiceStatus`函数。The handle can be used to update the service control manager's status information for the calling service using the unmanaged `SetServiceStatus` function.

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

span.span: The number of arguments in the argument array.

param.span: 指向参数数组的 结构。

summary.span: 注册命令处理程序并启动服务。

span.span: Registers the command handler and starts the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ServiceName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ServiceName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于向系统标识服务的简短名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the short name used to identify the service to the system.
The name of the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识服务到服务控制管理器。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 此属性的值必须与记录中的服务的名称相同相应的安装程序类的属性。The value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding installer class. 在代码中，通常设置服务的`main()`函数的可执行文件。In code, the of the service is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 还用于指定与关联属性。The is also used to specify the associated with the property. 这是服务的命令信息写入应用程序日志的实例。This is an instance that writes service command information to the Application log. ，提供事件日志中，源字符串必须先在服务写入事件日志设置。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service writes to the event log. 尝试访问事件日志之前设置的源名称会导致引发异常。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set causes an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

exception.span: 指定的名称为零长度字符串，或长于 ，就或者指定的名称包含前斜线或后斜线字符。

span.span: The specified name is a zero-length string or is longer than , or the specified name contains forward slash or backslash characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止执行服务。

span.span: Stops the executing service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的服务状态，以表示停止处于挂起状态和调用方法。The method sets the service state to indicate a stop is pending and calls the method. 停止应用程序后，服务状态将设置为已停止。After the application is stopped, the service state is set to stopped. 如果应用程序是托管的服务，则卸载应用程序域。If the application is a hosted service, the application domain is unloaded.
